pdftron.Filters

Class FlateEncode

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdftron.Filters.Filter
      • pdftron.Filters.FlateEncode

  • public class FlateEncode
extends Filter
    FlateEncode filter can be used to compress any data stream using Flate (i.e. ZIP) compression method.
